text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat

Product features:
9-ounce, 100 % nylon face
Recycled vinyl backing for a durable and longer-lasting product
Machine-made and tufted in the USA
Non-skid backing with taped borders for added durability
Machine washable; vacuum regularly and spot clean for any easy and quick clean

Product description:
text.Response A: The NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat is an exciting new product that is sure to make a big splash in the sports equipment market. This tufted football mat is made in the USA from high-quality, 9-ounce, 100% nylon face material with a durable, recycled vinyl backing. The mat features a non-skid backing with taped borders for superior durability and is conveniently machine-washable to make cleanup a breeze. With its bold colors and exciting sports-themed design, this mat will be a great addition to any home, tailgate party, or sports bar.
text.Response B: Show your team spirt and add some fun to your next tailgate with the NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat! This officially licensed mat is made from 9-ounce, 100 % nylon face with recycled vinyl backing, providing a durable and longer-lasting product. The non-skid backing with taped borders ensures that the mat will stay in place, even during the most intense games. Measuring at 60" L x 42" W, this machine-made and tufted in the USA mat is perfect for any game day gathering. It's easy to keep clean, simply machine wash and vacuum regularly and spot clean for a quick clean. Show your team pride and add the NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat to your tailgating essentials.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
